# bytesOutboundCount

**Instance Property**

The number of outbound bytes sent on the flow.

## Declaration

```swift
var bytesOutboundCount: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is only non-zero when the report [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEFilterReport/event-swift.property] is [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEFilterReport/Event-swift.enum/flowClosed].

## Getting report properties

- **flow**: The flow on which the associated action was taken.
- **action**: The action taken on the reported flow.
- **NEFilterAction**: The actions a data provider can take on a filter flow.
- **event**: The type of event indicated by this report.
- **NEFilterReport.Event**: A type that represents the kind of event indicated by a report.
- **bytesInboundCount**: The number of inbound bytes received from the flow.
